name: vecn
description: A module for creating n-dimensional vector types that support swizzling.

scripts.docs: ls docs | while read line; do echo "docs/$line"; done | grep -v "docs/conf.json" | xargs rm -rf && jsdoc src -d docs -P ./package.json -R ./README.md -t ./node_modules/ink-docstrap/template -c docs/conf.json && mv docs/**/**/* docs/ && rm -r docs/vecn

author: Bryce Wilson
